channel.title: Help please?!?!
channel.description:
I need to get/fix these:
Withdraw mode including "m" for a million, "k" for a thousand. - Prevent the changepassword command from saving passes with capitals in it. - Censor for websites. So .com turns into .*** - Bug fixes for these: http://www.runemyth.com/vb/showthrea...ex-of-Runemyth
Can you please help me or tell me what to do?

item.title: Help please?!?!
item.dc:creator: @3p1c_sk1ll3r 3p1c sk1ll3r
item.description:
@3p1c_sk1ll3r wrote:

I need to get/fix these:

Withdraw mode including “m” for a million, “k” for a thousand.

  • Prevent the changepassword command from saving passes with capitals in it.
  • Censor for websites. So .com turns into .***
  • Bug fixes for these: http://www.runemyth.com/vb/showthrea...ex-of-Runemyth

Can you please help me or tell me what to do?

Read full topic
